statements: SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_id, satellite_name, image_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE deforestation_area > 1000;
SELECT satellite_name, image_date, deforestation_area FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_name LIKE 'Landsat%';
SELECT image_id, deforestation_area FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY deforestation_area DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE deforestation_area > 1000 ORDER BY image_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT satellite_name, image_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY satellite_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(deforestation_area) AS avg_deforestation FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT DISTINCT satellite_name FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_date > '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_date < '2021-06-01' AND deforestation_area < 5000 ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT satellite_name, image_url FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_url, image_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_name = 'Landsat';
SELECT image_id, deforestation_area FROM SatelliteImages WHERE deforestation_area > 1000;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_date FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, satellite_name FROM SatelliteImages WHERE deforestation_area > 1000 ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_date, deforestation_area FROM SatelliteImages WHERE satellite_name = 'Landsat8' ORDER BY deforestation_area DESC;

SELECT image_id, image_url, deforestation_area, satellite_name FROM SatelliteImages INNER JOIN DeforestationHistory ON SatelliteImages.image_id = DeforestationHistory.image_id WHERE deforestation_percentage > 20 ORDER BY image_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationHistory WHERE deforestation_percentage BETWEEN 10 AND 30 ORDER BY deforestation_date DESC;

SELECT image_id, image_url, deforestation_percentage FROM SatelliteImages INNER JOIN DeforestationHistory ON SatelliteImages.image_id = DeforestationHistory.image_id WHERE deforestation_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY deforestation_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_changes WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT satellite_name, image_date, image_url FROM satellites INNER JOIN images ON satellites.satellite_id = images.satellite_id ORDER BY image_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_name DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT(satellite_name) AS name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE launch_date < '2018-01-01' ORDER BY launch_date ASC;

SELECT satellites.satellite_name, images.image_url, deforestation_changes.change_date FROM satellites JOIN images ON satellites.satellite_id = images.satellite_id JOIN deforestation_changes ON images.image_id = deforestation_changes.image_id WHERE deforestation_changes.change_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';

SELECT satellites.satellite_name, COUNT(images.image_id) AS total_images FROM satellites LEFT JOIN images ON satellites.satellite_id = images.satellite_id GROUP BY satellites.satellite_name HAVING total_images > 10 ORDER BY total_images DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, image_name, timestamp FROM satellite_images WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, location FROM satellite_images WHERE ST_Distance(location, 'POINT(0 0)') < 1000;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_changes WHERE change_type = 'Clear-cutting' ORDER BY area_effected DESC;
SELECT image_id, satellite_name, resolution FROM satellite_metadata WHERE satellite_name LIKE 'Landsat%';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT image_name, location FROM satellite_images WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(50 50)', 1000);
SELECT si.image_name, sc.change_type FROM satellite_images si JOIN deforestation_changes sc ON si.image_id = sc.image_id;
SELECT sm.satellite_name, sm.resolution, st.track_data FROM satellite_metadata sm JOIN satellite_tracks st ON sm.image_id = st.image_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM deforestation_changes WHERE image_id = satellite_images.image_id);
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_name, timestamp FROM SatelliteImages WHERE id = 1;
SELECT area_name, area_data FROM DeforestationAreas ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImageTags WHERE tag_name = 'Forest';
SELECT id, deforestation_type, change_log_id FROM DeforestationStatistics WHERE area_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_name, timestamp FROM SatelliteImages WHERE id = 1;
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(area_data) FROM DeforestationAreas ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT tag_name, image_name FROM SatelliteImageTags INNER JOIN SatelliteImages ON SatelliteImageTags.image_id = SatelliteImages.id;
SELECT area_id, deforestation_type FROM DeforestationStatistics WHERE change_log_id = 2 ORDER BY area_id ASC;
